explosives.name: explosives
explosives.desc: Add punch to your weapons, increases damage

drilling.desc: Drill through enemies, shot penetrates through to the next enemy.

air cooled.desc: Air cooling for your equipment, increases ROF

running shoes.desc: Run fast, increases player movement speed

vitamins.desc: Eat you vitamins! Increases max HP

grease.desc: Its Greased lightning! Increases projectile speed

investments.desc: Invest wisely. Gives you more points per kill.

zoom.name: zoom
zoom.desc: Zoomed In, increases the size of weapons.

duplicator.desc: Increases the amount of weapons fired
